text: I would not trade my skin for anything
in the world if I had to come back and
another life I would still choose to
come back as a black girl
I'm Olivia Assange and I'm a fashion
mother I came from a humble beginning it
was happier life I got a contract from a
good agency in South Africa I was
shooting a campaign for a clothing
company I didn't know much of what it
was until I started seeing my face in
stores when I was growing up people were
teasing you about being too dark I used
to think that being oversensitive but it
really is something that sits with you
and it really makes you think that I'm
not beautiful but then the community you
still get our darkest skinned black girl
being looked at a sudden type of way
colorism
Israel and I hope one day we can all
eradicate colorism because all black is
beautiful
